name: Iain
body: John did a great job on my car. It was like brand new inside—couldn’t recommend him enough. Great service.

name: Geoff
body: John made a fantastic job; the car is looking as the day I purchased. I will use John again and pass his number to friends looking for their car cleaned to a high standard.

name: Levani
body: Excellent work from John, car looks brand new inside even though it’s an old boy. I mentioned to him what concerned me the most and he rectified it. Definitely will be paying for his services again and soon.

name: Helen
body: Helen left a verified five-star rating for John’s detailing service.

name: Philip
body: Thank you John! My car looks great and he spent a solid five hours on it—absolutely worth it!

name: Hannah
body: John did an amazing job with my headlight restoration. Such a professional and friendly service, I cannot recommend him highly enough.

name: Sheila
body: Excellent service, my car was embarrassingly dirty but it's now absolutely immaculate. Booking was easy and communication was great. John is a lovely person who knows what he's doing and did an amazing job. I would definitely book with John again. Thank you.

name: Danny
body: Great communication and service. Happy to be subscribed with John.

name: Abraham
body: Absolute legend and a very nice, honest guy who knows what he's doing. One of the best services I've purchased—would highly recommend.

name: Ashleigh
body: John did an incredible job. So happy with the results and will absolutely be booking again. Great service and lovely lad.

name: Max
body: John really knows his stuff. Got marks off my paint that I didn’t think would come off. Brilliant service—will definitely be booking again.

name: Danny
body: Came when he meant to and did a fantastic job. Will definitely use John again!

name: Jacob
body: Would 100% recommend. Lovely guy, left the car absolutely spotless. Did things that didn’t even need doing just because it was included in the price anyway. 10/10.

name: Darren
body: Really nice to meet John. Gave me some handy tips and the car looks and feels spotless.

name: Liam
body: Absolute legend, really nice lad. Very hard working—amazing job and I will definitely be returning. Extremely recommended! Thanks John, great to meet you and very much appreciate your hard work. Catch you soon!

name: Monther
body: Excellent thorough service at the expected time.
